title: techStatus
description: The message will be sent as web socket 2HZ from SAS to FSG and will be considered as Keep-Alive message

status.description:
ServerUp,   ///< sdk connected to server
    ServerDown, ///< sdk disconnected from server
    InvalidVersion ///< sdk connected to server, but server version is different from sdk version

Created,   ///< stream added on server, calls on stream object are not allowed yet
    Started,   ///< stream started
    Connected, ///< all sources are connected
    Error,     ///< stream error
    EOS,       ///< end of stream
    Stopped,   ///< stream stopped
    Terminated ///< stream removed from server
